overview: The Film (stylized in all caps) is the first video album by Japanese duo Yoasobi. It was released through Sony Music Entertainment Japan on March 23, 2022, on Blu-ray exclusively. It consists of the duo's 2021 three concerts: Keep Out Theater, Sing Your World, and Nice to Meet You (day 2); and the enlarged version of the MBS TV's documentary program Jōnetsu Tairiku, starring Yoasobi, broadcast in December 2021. The Film debuted atop both Oricon Blu-ray Disc Chart and Music DVD and Blu-ray Chart, selling 21,000 copies in its first week.
title: THE FILM
